```{r}
pixnc <- nc_open("../data/sac-pixc-20181204/GDEM-DEM-ellip-109-0249/pixel_cloud.nc")

pixnc$var$latit

getvec <- function(...) {
  out0 <- ncvar_get(...)
  out <- as.vector(out0)
  out
}
pixc_df <- data.frame(
  lat = getvec(pixnc, "pixc/latitude"),
  lon = getvec(pixnc, "pixc/longitude"),
  height = getvec(pixnc, "pixc/height"),
  class = getvec(pixnc, "classification"),
  xtrack = getvec(pixnc, "cross_track_medium"),
  nlooks = getvec(pixnc, "num_looks"),
  dhdphi = getvec(pixnc, "dheight_dphase_medium") # meters per radian
)
nc_close(pixnc)
```
